span.span: The type of elements in the set.

summary.span: 表示按排序顺序维护的对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that is maintained in sorted order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象在插入和删除元素时维护排序顺序，而不会影响性能。A object maintains a sorted order without affecting performance as elements are inserted and deleted. 不允许重复元素。Duplicate elements are not allowed. 不支持更改现有项的排序值，这可能导致意外行为。Changing the sort values of existing items is not supported and may lead to unexpected behavior. 有关 的线程安全替代，请参阅 For a thread safe alternative to , see ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个 类，该类是使用采用 作为参数的构造函数创建的。The following example demonstrates a class that is created with the constructor that takes an as a parameter. 此比较器（`ByFileExtension`）用于按文件扩展名对文件名列表进行排序。This comparer (`ByFileExtension`) is used to sort a list of file names by their extensions. 此示例演示如何创建一组排序的媒体文件名称、删除不需要的元素、查看某个范围内的元素，并将该集与其他排序集进行比较。This example demonstrates how to create a sorted set of media file names, remove unwanted elements, view a range of elements, and compare the set with another sorted set. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.SortedSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.sortedset/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.SortedSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.sortedset/vb/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可枚举集合中的重复元素不会复制到 类的新实例中，并且不会引发异常。Duplicate elements in the enumerable collection are not copied into the new instance of the class, and no exceptions are thrown. 此构造函数是一个 `O(n log n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 `collection` 参数中元素的数目。This constructor is an `O(n log n)` operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `collection` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不接受重复元素。The class does not accept duplicate elements. 如果 `item` 已在集内，则此方法将返回 `false` 并且不会引发异常。If `item` is already in the set, this method returns `false` and does not throw an exception. 如果 已经等于 对象的容量，则会自动调整容量以容纳新项。If already equals the capacity of the object, the capacity is automatically adjusted to accommodate the new item. ## Examples 下面的示例向排序集添加元素。The following example adds elements to a sorted set. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法删除当前 中也处于 `other`中的任何元素。This method removes any element in the current that is also in `other`. `other` 中的重复值将被忽略。Duplicate values in `other` are ignored. 此方法是一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 `other` 参数中元素的数目。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is the number of elements in the `other` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例从已排序集内删除其他排序集内的元素。The following example removes elements from a sorted set that are duplicated in another sorted set. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对 或 的下一次调用引发了 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 此方法是一个 `O(log n)` 操作。This method is an `O(log n)` operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回 `lowerValue` 和 `upperValue`之间的元素范围的视图，如比较器所定义。This method returns a view of the range of elements that fall between `lowerValue` and `upperValue`, as defined by the comparer. 此方法不会从 复制元素，但会向基础 本身提供窗口。This method does not copy elements from the , but provides a window into the underlying itself. 您可以在视图和基础 中进行更改。You can make changes in both the view and in the underlying . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法仅列出一组排序的媒体文件名中的 AVI 文件。The following example uses the method to list only the AVI files from a sorted set of media file names. 比较器根据扩展名来计算文件名。The comparer evaluates file names according to their extensions. `lowerValue` 为 "AVI"，`upperValue` 只是一个较高的值 "AVJ"，用于获取所有 AVI 文件的视图。The `lowerValue` is "AVI" and the `upperValue` is only one value higher, "AVJ", to get the view of all AVI files. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将忽略 `other`中的任何重复元素。This method ignores any duplicate elements in `other`. 如果 `other` 参数所表示的集合是与当前 对象具有相同相等性比较器的 集合，则此方法是 `O(n)` 操作。If the collection represented by the `other` parameter is a collection with the same equality comparer as the current object, this method is an `O(n)` operation. 否则，此方法是 `O(n + m)` 操作，其中 `n` 为 ，`m` 为 `other`中的元素数。Otherwise, this method is an `O(n + m)` operation, where `n` is and `m` is the number of elements in `other`.

span.span: if the object is a proper subset of ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空集是任何其他集合的正确子集。An empty set is a proper subset of any other collection. 因此，如果当前 对象表示的集合为空，则此方法返回 `true`，除非 `other` 参数也是空集。Therefore, this method returns `true` if the collection represented by the current object is empty unless the `other` parameter is also an empty set. 如果 大于或等于 `other`中的元素数，则此方法始终返回 `false`。This method always returns `false` if is greater than or equal to the number of elements in `other`. 如果 `other` 表示的集合是与当前 对象具有相同相等性比较器的 集合，则此方法是 `O(n)` 操作。If the collection represented by `other` is a collection with the same equality comparer as the current object, then this method is an `O(n)` operation. 否则，此方法是 `O(n + m)` 操作，其中 `n` 为 ，`m` 为 `other`中的元素数。Otherwise, this method is an `O(n + m)` operation, where `n` is and `m` is the number of elements in `other`.

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 获取此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作。Getting the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

param.span: 搜索操作在集内找到的值；如果搜索操作未生成任何匹配项，则返回 T 的默认值。

summary.span: 在集内搜索给定的值，并返回所找到的相等值（如果有）。

span.span: Searches the set for a given value and returns the equal value it finds, if any.

returns.span: 一个指示搜索是否成功的值。

span.span: A value indicating whether the search was successful.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您想要重用以前存储的引用而不是新构造的引用时，这可能很有用（以便可以进行更多的引用共享）或查找具有比当前值更完整的数据的值，尽管它们的比较器函数指示它们相等。This can be useful when you want to reuse a previously stored reference instead of a newly constructed one (so that more sharing of references can occur) or to look up a value that has more complete data than the value you currently have, although their comparer functions indicate they are equal.
